game.views

Interface IUndoable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    framework.communication.internal.signal.ISignalListener, framework.api.IView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPileView, FoundationPileView, StockView, TableauPileView, TalonPileView

    public interface IUndoable
extends framework.api.IView
    Defines the functionality required to perform an undo operation on a particular component
    Author:
    Daniel Ricci <thedanny09@icloud.com>

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface framework.api.IView

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearBackup()
      Clears the backup associated to this component
      void performBackup()
      Performs a logical backup with respect to the state and business logic of this component
      void undoLastAction()
      Performs an undo based on the last backup that was performed on this component
